tool_description: Searches vendor databases and directories to identify potential vendors based on industry, location, size, and service categories.

industry_sector.description: Primary industry sector for vendor search (e.g., IT, construction, manufacturing)

service_categories.description: List of required service categories or specializations

company_size_range.description: Company size preference: small, medium, large, or any

error_messages: Invalid industry sector: Provide a recognized industry sector name
Empty service categories: At least one service category must be specified
Invalid company size range: Must be one of [small, medium, large, any]
Database connection failed: Unable to access vendor databases, try again later
usage: Specify industry_sector and service_categories as minimum requirements. Add geographic_regions, company_size_range, and certification_requirements to narrow search results.

total_vendors_found.description: Total number of vendors matching search criteria

vendor_ids.description: List of unique vendor identification numbers

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and results overview
